target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings and marked the contract as safe, but the contract contains a cross-function reentrancy vulnerability in the borrow function.

notes: The contract is vulnerable to a cross-function reentrancy attack. In the borrow function (line 66-82), ETH is sent to the borrower via a low-level call (line 75) before the final health check (line 78). During this external call, the attacker can re-enter the contract and call exitMarket (line 84-87), which sets inMarket[msg.sender] = false. This bypasses the health check on line 78 because isHealthy (line 53-64) returns false if !inMarket[account] (line 60). The attacker can then withdraw their collateral via withdraw (line 89-99), leaving the protocol with bad debt. The audit incorrectly reported the contract as safe.
